name: Primordial Criers of the Comet
description: Surviving a hellish meteor shower early in the family history, are the Primordial Criers of the Comet blessed or cursed? They also have a heavy amount of Primordyceps in their diet. Recently they’ve been feeling a little… different. Now lying in boredom, hungering for war, they look towards the future with a glint in their eye. Their future is bright. The only question: what comes next?
